reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 337: AMBIENT AIR QUALITY CRITERIA
reg_info.act_under: Environmental Protection Act   Loi sur la protection de l’environnement

content.content:
1. The desirable ambient air quality criteria for each contaminant set out in Column 1 of the Schedule is that amount of concentration or total amount of contaminant set out opposite thereto in Column 3 of the Schedule in the unit of measurement set out opposite thereto in Column 2 of the Schedule for the time set out opposite thereto in Column 4 of the Schedule. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 337, s. 1. SCHEDULE  Item
